Wexflow.CommandLineParserClient.commandLineArgs: create -n "My First Workflow" -d "I am created from CLI" -l 0 -t Id=1:Name="My First Task":Type="Wait";Id=2:Name="My Second Task":Type="Wait" -s TaskId=1|Name=duration|Value=0.00:00:30;TaskId=2|Name=duration|Value=0.00:00:30 --prerequisites TaskId=2|DependsOn=1
